entry.title: Sata Erilaista Nuorta Layout design & Cover design

link.title: Sata Erilaista Nuorta Layout design & Cover design

entry.content:
Sata Erilaista Nuorta Layout design & Cover design

I also designed as a school project an UI design for the website of Hooked Saimaa. I used Figma and illustrator in this project.
entry.summary: Sata Erilaista Nuorta Layout design & Cover design I also designed as a school project an UI design for the website of Hooked Saimaa. I used Figma and illustrator in this project.

entry.title: Hooked saimaa Website Design
entry.content:
Hooked saimaa brand design

Hooked Saimaa is a company that provides fishing trips for all kinds of people. The brand is very inclusive and wishes to provide an outlet for people who want to experience Saimaa in all of its glory.
entry.summary: Hooked saimaa brand design Hooked Saimaa is a company that provides fishing trips for all kinds of people. The brand is very inclusive and wishes to provide an outlet for people who want to experience Saimaa in all of its glory.
